In recent days, as a result of the attacks of the Armenian occupation forces, our army has been killed and several soldiers have been killed.
May Allah have mercy on them! But their blood was not left on the ground.
The Azerbaijani Army suffered a great blow to the enemy. According to our information, the invaders have been destroyed.
Armenians always hide their losses.
However, the truth is that in these cases the Azerbaijani Army was superior, and in these cases we have won.
The Azerbaijani Army is a strong army. Today, citizens of Azerbaijan, especially those living in the frontier regions (cont) http://t.co/eqeV6gPZil
Our territorial integrity will be restored. There are several factors that give rise to this. Azerbaijan is getting stronger and stronger.
Nagorno-Karabakh, the occupied lands are our ancient land. From the point of view of international law (cont) http://t.co/yIAibNi2Zg
We will rebuild all our cities and villages after returning to the occupied lands.
Recent developments have also shown that the spirit of patriotism in society is very high.
Hundreds of appeals are being made, young people from other regions of Azerbaijan come to the frontline, express their desires.
Like volunteers, they want to take part in the restoration of our territorial integrity. I still do not need it.
The Azerbaijani army is the strongest army in the region. Both combat capability, professionalism and military-technical equipment are at the highest level.
Simply, the negotiation process is still going on. There are certain hopes.
Azerbaijani citizens are dissatisfied with the mediators' activities. The main mission of the mediators is the settlement of the conflict.
The mission of the mediators is not to freeze the issue or to strengthen confidence-building measures.
The biggest trust in them may be the withdrawal of the occupying forces from our lands.
The Azerbaijani army demonstrates its power and positively affects the negotiation process.
Because the enemy clearly sees that it will not stand before us.
If the Azerbaijani army takes action, the enemy's situation can be very severe. We know this, and we know enemies and mediators.
Therefore, I think that the events that have taken place in recent days will also bring international mediators to action.
The occupying state should be clearly signaled that this occupation must be abandoned.
We do not live in peace, we live in war. Everyone should know. The war is over. The first stage of the war is over.
However, the second stage may begin. No one can rule out that. We do not want war, we want peace.
But at the same time, we want our lands.
Armenia wants to maintain its current status and status quo. The main desire and activity of the mediators (cont) http://t.co/MgjkZyLZbN
But, unlike them, we want our land. We want our grandparents back. We are right in that request.
Right, justice, and international law support our position. Therefore, neither peace nor war can continue.
The main problem facing us today is the Karabakh problem. We have put all our efforts in this direction.
On the basis of our steps, our focus is on this issue.
The development, strengthening and strengthening of our international position, as well as the development of Azerbaijan, bring the solution to the problem.
Today, Azerbaijani citizens are proud of living in the Azerbaijani state. They are citizens of this state.
Because Azerbaijan is pursuing an independent policy. The focus of this policy is the interests of the Azerbaijani people.
The people's interests are above all else. We will continue to pursue this policy in all directions.
Armenian patrons - the most supportive circles, circles of foreign countries, including (cont) http://t.co/vqNH3TkWie
If he fails to comply with his obligation, if he does not enforce international organizations' decisions, (cont) http://t.co/GdlJyHFBYC
Our positions are strong and strong, and the Azerbaijani army has gained full advantage in the line of contact.
The Azerbaijani army's professionalism, its fighting capacity, the Azerbaijani soldiers, the secretaries and officers of the homeland (cont) http://t.co/60lqRkx0Nl
Our military units, especially military units located on the frontline, have enthusiasm and (cont) http://t.co/nHie590wxK
We will further increase our combat potential.
The material and technical supply of the Azerbaijani army is at the highest level.
The weapon we have acquired recently has given us reason to say that we can fulfill any task.
Today, thanks to the policy of the Azerbaijani state, stability in the region is still being ensured. Azerbaijan is a stabilizing country.
Today, we have a stronger army, increasing our capabilities, and this army can carry out any task at any time.
Today, the enemy is in panic, hustle. We have enough possibilities to know what's happening on the opposite side.
We have achieved complete military and moral superiority. We are in our own land.
A week ago, our martyrs were killed on their soil.
The question is: what is the occupation of the Armenian soldier - a soldier of the occupation forces in Aghdam?
We will restore our sovereignty. Azerbaijan flag will be raised on all occupied lands, including Shusha and Khankendi.
This is our goal. We are pursuing this goal and we must create a stronger army to achieve this goal.
We will restore our territorial integrity either peacefully or militarily.
The landscape that has been observed on the frontline over the past week and in the past has given us grounds to say that we are ready for any option.
As we have won the Armenians in the political and economic arena, we are able to win them in the battlefield.
We have strong military potential. But our greatest strength is the courage and patriotism of our soldiers.
In Azerbaijan, the spirit of patriotism is high. Moral superiority is on our side.
The city of Agdam was destroyed by Armenian pirates and wild animals.
Here are the remains of the city of Agdam. All buildings except two buildings were destroyed.
We will restore the town of Agdam. We will restore all the occupied and dispersed cities.
We will return to that land, we live and live on this idea.
